name: Escape Together (itch) (Vinark117)
description:
Escape Together is an escape room game with a single level. The solutions of the level are randomly generated each time you play the game, so the solution is never the same, only the order of the puzzles are. The game also has a leaderboard so you can compete agains friends, on who can beat the room faster.

Completing the game for the first time for most of the players is around 50 minutes, after getting familiar with the game, it can be completed in 10-15 minutes.
